thread.title: New Lifestyle and Travel Magazine: "TRAVELHOSTNew Hampshire" to Host Private Launch Event at Labelle Winery
thread.title_full: New Lifestyle and Travel Magazine: "TRAVELHOSTNew Hampshire" to Host Private Launch Event at Labelle Winery - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: New Lifestyle and Travel Magazine: "TRAVELHOSTNew Hampshire" to Host Private Launch Event at Labelle Winery
text:
TRAVELHOST New Hampshire Magazine
AMHERST, N.H. , Oct. 7, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- Christine Shaw , Publisher, and Helen Ryba , Associate Publisher announced the October 12, 2015 , launch of their new TRAVELHOST New Hampshire Magazine . The Magazine features the best of tourist destinations in New Hampshire ; with special sections dedicated to lifestyle features, products, cuisine, lodging, and culture. The Magazine aims to highlight New Hampshire as a modern and innovative tourism center while also showcasing the area's dedication to its unique experiences, traditions and New England culture. The quarterly magazine will be distributed in high-end hotels and travel venues around New Hampshire and Boston . www.travelhostnh.com
Photo - http://photos.prnewswire.com/prnh/20151006/274597
About the Launch Event
Coinciding with New Hampshire's spectacular Fall foliage season, the private event will be held to launch the much-anticipated inaugural issue of TRAVELHOST New Hampshire. The event will take place at the award-winning LaBelle Winery . The Winery graces the cover of TRAVELHOST'S introductory issue: "SAVOR The Granite State ." LaBelle Winery will host the October 12th Launch Event from 5:30-7:00 p.m. at their luxurious winery. LaBelle Winery is located at 345 NH-101, in Amherst, NH . www.labellewinery.com
Christine Shaw states, "This launch event in partnership with TRAVELHOST and LABELLE Winery will demonstrate that New Hampshire is teaming with cutting-edge and unique attractions. Our rich heritage, culture, gastronomy, wine, breweries and attractions will thus be highlighted in the New England markets to help us develop high potential and further expand our ties."
The event's guests will be an exclusive, elite group including CEOs, top executives, elite business professionals, and select members of the press. The event is private; RSVP required.
About The Publisher
Christine Shaw is Publisher, Chief Executive Officer of TravelHost NH , where she oversees advertising, marketing, and innovation across all brand platforms.
Before founding TRAVELHOST NH, Shaw held multiple senior positions in publishing. Most recently she held that of senior vice president at PennWell Publishing, leading the technology division and serving as the company's liaison between Technology, marketing, and PennWell's iconic media brands.
Christine is a sought-after speaker, author, and advocate for New England travel and lifestyle. She is considered one of the most influential travel and destination leaders in the New England area; showcasing travel, lifestyle; personal and business travel. Applying the travel industry's principles, she has enlisted top-tier writers and researchers for TRAVELHOST NH. She and her staff have been able to showcase New Hampshire's top travel destinations, including the best places to see New Hampshire foliage, and articles about the New England lifestyle, destinations, and best-selling products. Through her extensive travels, her readers have benefited greatly. Her speaking engagements are attended by travel and tourism executives as well as participants from enterprises specializing in hospitality, marketing, digital media, and sales. cshaw@travelhost.com
For media inquiries, contact:
Hampton Bates Public Relations
Sylvia R. Hampton
Office: 603.570.4816
